about.title: About Pischetola Antiques
about.subtitle: A legacy of excellence in antique collection and restoration since 1985

our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.paragraph1: Pischetola Antiques was founded in 1985 by Antonio Pischetola, a passionate collector with a keen eye for historical craftsmanship and authenticity. What began as a small collection in a modest shop in Florence, Italy, has evolved into a respected establishment in the world of fine antiques.
our_story.paragraph2: For over three decades, we have dedicated ourselves to preserving the beauty and history of exceptional pieces from various periods and regions. Our commitment to quality, authenticity, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name among collectors, interior designers, and antique enthusiasts worldwide.
our_story.paragraph3: Today, Pischetola Antiques continues to be a family-owned business, carrying forward Antonio's legacy of passion and expertise into the digital age, making our curated collection accessible to a global audience.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Every piece in our collection undergoes rigorous authentication by our team of experts to ensure its provenance and historical accuracy.

restoration.title: Restoration
restoration.description: Our skilled craftsmen carefully restore each piece using traditional techniques and materials that honor the original craftsmanship.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: We provide detailed documentation for each item, including its history, origin, period, and any restoration work performed.

shipping.title: Worldwide Shipping
shipping.description: We offer secure, insured shipping services to ensure your treasured purchases arrive safely at your doorstep, anywhere in the world.

marco.name: Marco Pischetola
marco.bio: Son of founder Antonio Pischetola, Marco has been immersed in the world of antiques since childhood and has developed an extraordinary eye for exceptional pieces.

davide.name: Davide Pischetola
davide.bio: With over 20 years of experience in antique restoration, Davide brings traditional craftsmanship techniques to preserve and restore our finest pieces.

stefano.name: Stefano Pischetola
stefano.bio: Stefano combines his deep knowledge of art history with modern authentication techniques to ensure the authenticity and provenance of every piece in our collection.

visit.title: Visit Our Showroom
visit.description: We invite you to experience our collection in person at our showroom in the heart of Florence.

items_section.title: Types of Items We May Purchase
items_section.description: We're interested in acquiring a wide range of antiques and collectibles. Here are some examples of items we typically consider:

furniture.title: Antique Furniture
furniture.description: Furniture from various periods and styles, particularly from the 18th to mid-20th century.

paintings.title: Paintings & Fine Art
paintings.description: Original paintings, drawings, and fine art from different movements and eras.

decorative.title: Decorative Arts
decorative.description: Clocks, mirrors, bronzes, sculptures, and other decorative objects.

silver.title: Silver & Jewelry
silver.description: Antique silver pieces, jewelry, and precious metal objects with historical or artistic value.

ceramics.title: Ceramics & Porcelain
ceramics.description: Fine porcelain, ceramics, and pottery from renowned makers and traditions.
